title: The meme thrives
author: VD
content_html: Here are three new additions to what was formerly known as the reader blogroll. Outside the Box, Anti-Buffoonshevik Thoughtcrime, Difster. A recent email from the notorious Franger indicates that he, too, will soon be numbered – or perhaps listed would be the more accurate term – among the Elect.
content_text:
Here are three new additions to what was formerly known as the reader blogroll.
Outside the Box
,
Anti-Buffoonshevik Thoughtcrime
,
Difster
.  A recent email from the notorious Franger indicates that he, too, will soon be numbered – or perhaps listed would be the more accurate term – among the Elect.
